docs.lead_paragraph: The principal new play in to-morrow night's theatrical, programme will be a farcical comedy by David Belasco, who has been hitherto, except in his attempts at "comic relief," in serious drama, (and these have not been his happiest attempts,) grave, emotional, and "dramatic" But since the day of "La Belle Russe" Mr. Belasco has had very few failures.

headline.main: THIS WEEK'S NEW BILLS.; Belasco's Comic Play, Return of Maude Adams, Mansfield's Farewell, and Other Incidents.
